home.title: Create, Analyze and Grow with the Power of AI
home.description: Generate ideas, write optimized scripts and compare your performance with AI.

features.title: Why choose Videatly?
features.subtitle: Your secret weapon for viral content
features.description: Stop wasting time with brainstorming. Start creating content that captivates your audience and grows your channel automatically.
features.aiMagicDescription: Generate unlimited creativity with AI. Create perfect video ideas for your audience and preferences.
features.aiScriptsDescription: Transform ideas into engaging stories instantly. Our AI creates captivating scripts that keep viewers glued to the screen.
features.skyrocketGrowDescription: Grow 10x faster. What used to take days now happens in minutes with our AI.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How can I customize my profile?
faq.a1: You can customize your profile by adding a photo, editing your personal information, and setting your notification preferences. All these options are accessible through the 'Profile Settings' menu.
faq.a2: The app is optimized to work on all modern browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge). For the best experience, we recommend keeping your browser updated to the latest version.
faq.q3: How is my personal data handled?
faq.a3: Data security is our priority. We use end-to-end encryption to protect your information, and we never share your data with third parties without your explicit consent.
faq.q4: What should I do if I forget my password?
faq.a4: If you forget your password, you can use the 'Forgot Password' function on the login page. You'll receive an email with instructions to securely reset your password.
faq.q5: How can I report a technical issue?
faq.a5: You can report technical issues through the 'Support' section in the app or by sending a detailed email to our technical team. Include screenshots and precise descriptions to help us resolve the issue more quickly.
faq.a6: Getting started is easy! Simply sign up for an account, and you'll have immediate access to all features. Our documentation provides comprehensive guides for new users.
faq.a7: Yes, we provide dedicated support through our help center and email. Our team typically responds within 24 hours to any queries or concerns.

languageSettings.title: It is necessary to set the language
languageSettings.description: To personalize your video recommendations, it is necessary to set the language in the Settings page.

info.title: Understand your options
info.description: A guide to help you choose the right settings for your videos

fields.title: Video Length
fields.description: The video length is an important factor for the success of your video. If your video is too short, it may not be enough to capture the attention of your audience. If it is too long, it may be boring and push your viewers to skip the video.

fields.title: Target Interest
fields.description: The target interest is the audience you like. If your video is too short, it may not be enough to capture the attention of your audience. If it is too long, it may be boring and push your viewers to skip the video.

fields.title: Video Type
fields.description: The video type is an important factor for the success of your video. If your video is too short, it may not be enough to capture the attention of your audience. If it is too long, it may be boring and push your viewers to skip the video.

languagePicker.languageDescription: We need to know your language to personalize your experience with the app and the AI features.

userPlan.description1: We do not store your payment information. All payments are processed by

deleteCard.title: Danger Zone
deleteCard.description: Deleting your account will remove all your data from our servers. By deleting your account, you will no longer be able to access your account or any of its contents.

info.title: Account & Privacy
info.description: Manage your account settings and your privacy.

privacy.title: Data & Privacy
privacy.description: We collect and store only essential data needed to provide our services. Your data is encrypted and securely stored.

account.title: Account Security
account.description: Your account is protected with Google OAuth authentication. We recommend enabling two-factor authentication for additional security.

data.title: Data Management
data.description: Your data is securely stored and managed in our systems. We handle all data operations automatically to ensure smooth service delivery.

info.title: Idea Details
info.description: Here you can find information about the fields available to create a new idea

fields.title: Suggestions
fields.description: Enter your suggestions for the idea to create, you can add more later when you are in the chat with the AI

fields.title: Content Style & Video Length
fields.description: Choose a style that fits your content and your audience. Educational videos work well with explanatory formats, while entertainment can benefit from storytelling. Consider the duration based on the platform: shorter for social media, longer for in-depth topics.

fields.title: Video Type & Target Interest
fields.description: Choose formats that align with your content goals. Different types generate varying levels of engagement. Define your audience's interests to optimize content discovery and reach the right viewers.

fields.title: Keywords
fields.description: Include 5-7 relevant keywords that your audience might search for. Mix specific terms with broader concepts. Consider adding variations of your main topic and related concepts to improve SEO and content discovery.
